lead_paragraph: Yahoo stock slumped after the company announced hackers had stolen information from at least 500 million users, but Twitter stock jumped on word of deal talks.

headline.print_headline: Wall Street Dips as Oil Prices Tumble
headline.main: Wall St. Closes Lower, With Oil Prices in Focus
